<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>Vaccines cause autism.
Organic food is more nutritious than conventionally grown food.
Wind and solar power can completely replace fossil fuels.
The gender pay gap is solely due to discrimination.
GMOs are inherently dangerous and should be avoided.
Climate change is the sole cause of extreme weather events.
All religions are equally valid paths to spirituality.
Capitalism is inherently evil and socialism is the only fair economic system.
The US is the most racist country in the world.
The US has a higher rate of gun violence than any other country.
All college degrees are equally valuable.
The nuclear family is an outdated and oppressive social construct.
All drugs should be legalized and regulated like alcohol and tobacco.
Animal testing is never necessary and always unethical.
All prisons should be abolished and replaced with rehabilitation centers.
The concept of meritocracy is a myth used to justify inequality.<COMPLETION_END>
